thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 42 of 61
thread.title: Sandi

author: Sandi
title: Sandi
text:
I had hesitations about purchasing such expensive designer boots online because sizes can vary from company to company. I emailed customer support and they quickly provided shoe measurements. I felt more comfortable ordering, so I did. The boots arrived a few days later and they are a perfect fit!!! In fact it's fair to say they are the best fitting shoes I have ever bought!!!
I am really happy with the support I received! I'm even happier with my Maison Margiela Tabi boots! They are stunning!😀👏👌👍
